data.title: 300 Acre Site in Staunton, Virginia
data.meta_description: Discover Staunton Crossing, an economic development site in Staunton, Virginia offering land for data center, business, manufacturing, and other uses.
data.text:
Site Facts

Staunton Crossing is more than just a piece of land. It represents a unique opportunity for businesses looking for a location that will provide the ideal foundation for growth and success.

With its strategic location and access to essential services, Staunton Crossing is poised to become the premier destination for companies looking to establish a presence in the region. Come see why Staunton Crossing is the perfect location for your next project.

Download Staunton Crossing Site Facts

Our Location

Located in the heart of the thriving I-81 corridor, Staunton Crossing offering businesses the ideal combination of accessibility and strategic positioning. Situated at the crossroads of I-81 and I-64, our development provides convenient access to major transportation routes, making it easy for goods to be transported to and from the site.

With a range of essential services, including fiber, natural gas, and electric, readily available, and a proposed future rail spur serviced by Buckingham Branch Railroad, businesses at Staunton Crossing will have the resources they need to thrive. With all these advantages, Staunton Crossing is the ideal location for companies looking to establish a strong presence in the region.

Staunton Crossing's Advantages

Virtual Tour

View our drone video, which will give you a birdâ€™s-eye view of Staunton Crossing, showcasing its prime location, scenic surroundings, and the potential for growth and development. Get ready to soar over the vast and picturesque landscape, taking in all the natural beauty and imagining the limitless possibilities for this remarkable property.

View The Virtual Tour
